TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageEncodingBindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension, class System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension
Public NotInheritable Class BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement Inherits MessageEncodingBindingElement Implements IPolicyExportExtension, IWsdlExportExtension

summary.span: 繫結項目，指定 XML 用來編碼訊息的 .NET 二進位格式。

span.span: The binding element that specifies the .NET Binary Format for XML used to encode messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 編碼是將訊息轉換成位元組序列的處理序，Encoding is the process of transforming a message into a sequence of bytes. 解碼則是相反的處理序。Decoding is the reverse process. [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 包含 SOAP 訊息的三種編碼類型：文字、二進位和訊息傳輸最佳化機制 (MTOM)。 includes three types of encoding for SOAP messages: Text, Binary and Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM). 為繫結項目，指定應該使用 XML 的 .NET 二進位格式來編碼訊息，而且可以選擇指定字元編碼以及要使用的 SOAP 和 WS-Addressing 版本。The is the binding element that specified the .NET Binary Format for XML should be used for encoding messages, and has options to specify the character encoding and the SOAP and WS-Addressing version to be used. 二進位編碼是最有效率、但互通性最差的編碼選項。Binary encoding is most efficient but least interoperable of the encoding options. 如需有關繫結項目，指定訊息使用編碼 XML 的文字表示法，請參閱。For more information about the binding element that specifies messages are encoded using a textual representation of XML, see . 如需有關繫結項目，指定訊息使用編碼 MTOM 訊息編碼，請參閱。For more information about the binding element that specifies messages are encoded using the MTOM message encoding, see . 如果要實作自訂訊息編碼器，請使用 類別。To implement a custom message encoder, use the class. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement Clone() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Clone () As BindingElement

summary.span: 建立從目前項目初始化的新 物件。

span.span: Creates a new object initialized from the current one.

returns.span: 屬性值與目前項目之值相等的 物件。

span.span: A object with property values equal to those of the current element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這會建立目前繫結項目物件樹狀結構的完整複本 (也稱為深層複製)。This creates a complete copy of the current binding element object tree, also called a deep clone. 物件的深層複製會建立物件的複本，以及該物件直接或間接參考之每個物件的複本，A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. 這個動作也可以稱為複製整個物件圖形。傳回深層複製可讓執行階段支援多個自訂繫結共用自訂繫結項目的情況。(This can also be described as copying the entire object graph.) Returning a deep clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element. 如果沒有傳回深層複製，則表示執行階段行為尚未定義。If a deep clone is not returned, the runtime behavior is undefined. 相較之下，物件的淺層複製則只是物件的複本。A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. 如果物件包含其他物件的參考，則淺層複製不會建立所參考之物件的複本，而只會複製原始物件的參考。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#10)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#10)]

span.span: Gets or sets the compression format for the binding element.
The compression format for the binding element.

summary.span: 建立二進位訊息編碼器處理站，這個處理站會採用目前編碼繫結項目所指定的 SOAP 和 WS-Addressing 版本與字元編碼。

span.span: Creates a factory for binary message encoders that employ the SOAP and WS-Addressing versions and the character encoding specified by the current encoding binding element.
The that this binding element creates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理站產生的 物件可以使用二進位訊息編碼來讀取及寫入訊息。The objects that the factory produces can read and write messages using the binary message encoding. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#11)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#11)]

.method public hidebysig virtual instance !!T GetProperty<class T>(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) (context As BindingContext) As T

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 此方法所查詢的型別物件。

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.
The for the binding element.

summary.span: 從繫結項目堆疊的適當層次中，傳回要求的型別物件 (如果有的話)。

span.span: Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the binding element stack.

returns.span: 要求的型別物件 (如果存在的話)，如果不存在則為 。

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可要求型別物件，用來從繫結項目堆疊中的適當層次設定屬性或取得狀態的介面。Use this to request a typed object for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the binding element stack. 如果某個層次支援傳回要求的物件，它就會傳回物件。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不是，則會將呼叫向下委派到堆疊中的下一層。If not, it delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到達堆疊的底部，而且沒有任何繫結項目層次支援要求的物件，則該方法會傳回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no binding element layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#12)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxReadPoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 讀取器的數目上限，這些是配置於集區、準備用來處理傳入訊息的讀取器。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of XML readers that are allocated to a pool and are ready for use to process incoming messages.

value.span: 要保存在集區中的讀取器數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of readers to be kept in the pool.

value.span: 預設值為 64 個讀取器。

span.span: The default value is 64 readers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增加這個數字會增加記憶體消耗量，但是可讓編碼器做好處理傳入訊息量突然暴增的準備，因為編碼器可以使用集區中已經建立的讀取器，而不必建立新的讀取器。Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of incoming messages because it is able to use readers from the pool are already created instead of having to create new ones. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#2)]

exception.span: 設定的值小於或等於零。

span.span: The value set is less than or equal to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxSessionSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定工作階段中可將傳輸程序最佳化的可用記憶體上限。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of memory available within a session for optimizing transmission procedures.

value.span: 工作階段的大小上限，以位元組為單位。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of a session.

value.span: 預設值為 2048 個位元組。

span.span: The default value is 2048 bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 的 .NET 二進位格式可以將使用於工作階段內多則訊息中的字串傳輸最佳化。The .NET Binary Format for XML can optimize the transmission of strings when they are used in multiple messages within a session. 一旦某一字串已在訊息中傳送時，包含該字串的額外訊息可以使用字串的 ID 來參考該字串。Once a string is sent in a message, additional messages that contain that string can refer to it using only the string's ID. 這需要將字串以及其 ID 儲存在記憶體中。This requires that the strings and their IDs be stored in memory. 這樣該 ID 就可以在後續的訊息中重新傳輸，而不用傳輸整個字串。This allows the ID to be retransmitted in subsequent messages instead of the entire string. 此查詢可提高使用二進位格式時的訊息傳輸效率。This lookup increases the efficiency of message transmission when using the binary format. 可取得及設定配置來儲存這些字串的最大記憶體量。The gets and sets the maximum amount of memory that is allocated to store these strings. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#3)]

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxWritePoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 XML 寫入器的數目上限，這些是配置於集區、準備用來處理傳出訊息的寫入器。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of XML writers that are allocated to a pool and are ready for use to process outgoing messages.

value.span: 要保存在集區中的寫入器數目上限。

span.span: The maximum number of writers to be kept in the pool.

value.span: 預設值為 16 個寫入器。

span.span: The default value is 16 writers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增加這個數字會增加記憶體消耗量，但是可讓編碼器做好處理傳出訊息量突然暴增的準備，因為編碼器可以使用集區中已經建立的寫入器，而不必建立新的寫入器。Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of outgoing messages because it is able to use writers from the pool that are already created instead of having to create new ones. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#4)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#4)]

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定與訊息及其交換相關聯的 SOAP 和 WS-Addressing 版本。Specifies the versions of SOAP and WS-Addressing associated with a message and its exchange. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Xml::XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas ^ ReaderQuotas { System::Xml::XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas ^ get(); void set(System::Xml::XmlDictionaryReaderQuotas ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得 XML 訊息複雜度的條件約束，而這些條件約束可由以此繫結項目所設定的端點處理。

span.span: Gets constraints on the complexity of XML messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding element.

value.span: ，指定已交換之 SOAP 訊息的複雜度條件約束。

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints on SOAP messages exchanged.

value.span: 接下來的＜備註＞一節提供了這些條件約束的預設值。

span.span: The default values for these constraints are provided in the following remarks section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複雜性條件約束可以防止嘗試使用訊息複雜性困住端點處理資源的阻絕服務 (DOS) 攻擊類別。The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表示這些條件約束及其預設值的屬性包括：The properties that express these constraints and their default values are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384 ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/cs/program.cs#6)] [!code-vb[S_UE_BinaryMessageEncodingBindingElement#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_binarymessageencodingbindingelement/vb/module1.vb#6)]

returns.span: 如果應序列化 SOAP 訊息結構版本，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the SOAP message structure version should be serialized; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 訊息的版本決定訊息的結構。The version of the SOAP message determines the structure of the message.

returns.span: 如果讀取器配額應該序列化，則為 ，否則為 。
